code: import React from'react';export var resume=function resume(token){fetch('https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/player/play',{method:'PUT',headers:{Authorization:"Bearer "+JSON.parse(token)}}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});};export var pause=function pause(token){fetch('https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/player/pause',{method:'PUT',headers:{Authorization:"Bearer "+JSON.parse(token)}}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});};export var playSong=function playSong(token,songId){console.log(token,songId);fetch('https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/player/play',{method:'PUT',headers:{Authorization:"Bearer "+JSON.parse(token)},body:JSON.stringify({"uris":["spotify:track:"+songId]})}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});};export var getStatus=function getStatus(token){return fetch('https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/player',{method:'GET',headers:{Authorization:"Bearer "+JSON.parse(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(json){return json.is_playing;}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});};export var getCurrentPhoto=function getCurrentPhoto(token){return fetch('https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/player',{method:'GET',headers:{Authorization:"Bearer "+JSON.parse(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(json){console.log(json.item.name);return json.item.album.images[0].url;}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});};export var getCurrentSong=function getCurrentSong(token){return fetch('https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/player',{method:'GET',headers:{Authorization:"Bearer "+JSON.parse(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(json){return{title:json.item.name,artist:json.item.artists[0].name,liked:false,photo:json.item.album.images[0].url,id:json.item.id};}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});};
